name: 月球坠落时 Moon Fall
description:
The earth's satellite, the moon, will gradually approach the earth one day in the future.

Before the end came, mankind desperately launched a war to destroy civilization.

On the ruins of the city, in the ruins of the church.

I started my apocalyptic journey with the silver-haired girl Xun.

Stumbling, full of moving and surprising.

Towards an uncertain future.

According to the player's decision, the story will have a completely different direction.

The fate of the moon, "our" future, little love.

Will be extended in the ruins
